feed.title: Homarr iFrames Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v0.1.0
entry.content:
Added

  • New optional button in the Vikunja iframe to set task as done.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/commits/v0.1.0

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v0.1.1
entry.content:
Added

  • Uptime Kuma iFrame to show the number of UP and DOWN sites.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v0.1.7 - Update Cinemark iframe
entry.content:
Changed

  • Due to changes in the Cinemark site layout, the project started to get the movies from the Cinemark API instead of scraping the site. There are also breaking changes on the iframe query arguments. Now, instead of specifying your city name to get all movies in all theaters in your city, you have to get the IDs of the theaters in your city to get all movies on display in your city.
  • Removed the city query argument: there is no way to get the movies from all theaters of a city using this way anymore.
  • Removed the theaters query argument: use the theaterIds query argument now.
  • Added the theaterIds query argument: the iframe will show movies from the theaters where the ID is specified. Check the API docs to see how to get the theaters' IDs. To get all movies from your city, you have to specify the IDs of all theaters in your city.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v0.1.6...v0.1.7

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v0.1.9 - Overseerr iframe added
entry.content:
Added

  • Overseerr iFrame to show a list of media requests.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v0.1.8...v0.1.9

entry.title: New release for Homarr iFrames: v0.1.14 - Media releases iframe added
entry.content:
Added:

  • Media releases iframe to show media from Sonarr and Radarr that releases today.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diogovalentte/homarr-iframes/compare/v0.1.13...v0.1.14
